long_description: Durably built yet lightweight, the REI Sport Beast 31 neatly separates urban attire from the gear you need for your favorite outdoor activities. Bag zips open clamshell-style to reveal two halves, with each half covered by a zip panel; when bag is fully closed, the panels act as a center divider to separate your gear. The lightest rolling luggage made by REI, the Sport Beast line is made from abrasion-resistant Cordura(R) nylon; molded foam on the back provides structure. Rugged telescoping handle and smooth-rolling wheels make the bag easy to maneuver; cushioned grab handle makes it comfortable to lift. "Add-a-bag" hook near the top handle makes it easy to attach ride-along baggage and wheel your way through a crowded airport. Kickstand under the front of the luggage lets you park it upright. An interior zippered mesh pocket and 2 exterior zippered pockets provide organization. Exterior zippers are lock compatible (locks sold separately). The REI Sport Beast 31 includes a discreet ID window accessible via an inner zip pocket.
short_description: Durably built yet lightweight, the REI Sport Beast 31 neatly separates urban attire from the gear you need for your favorite outdoor activities.
